RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN:
Graduated in Electrical Engineering from the University of Vale do Paraнba (1995), with experience in the software and systems development area in diverse fields.
Works since 1995 with software development in projects such as software for the OCOE (Overall Check-Out Equipment), master test controller for the integration and testing (AIT) of INPE PMM and CBERS satellites, for Power Supply Subsystem and Electric Ground Support Equipment (EGSE) for Satellites of Multi-Mission Platform (PMM), for Intelligent Traffic Systems, for vehicle monitoring and automatic magnetic guidance, for Tolls and Motorways Automation Systems in Brazil and abroad (Australia and India), for Automatic Test Systems for automotive assembly lines, configuration management systems and product control structures, and software for structural calculations in construction area;
